thread.title: An excellent Hotel in one of the most prestigious areas in Paris (7th arrondissement)

author: muilau18
title: An excellent Hotel in one of the most prestigious areas in Paris (7th arrondissement)
text:
We have been to Paris many times, but this is the first time we stayed at this unique boutique hotel which turned out to be a pleasant surprise for us: excellent services; friendly staffs; high-quality breakfast; very clean room; extremely comfortable bed linen (maybe Egyptian cotton?); spacious bathroom; plus great location!
Will definitely stay here again next time when we visit Paris!!!
